CustomField.formula:
(Contract_Amount__c - ( Contract_Amount__c * Discount__c )) + Markup_Amount__c
/*buildertek__Contract_Amount__c +((( buildertek__Contract_Amount__c * buildertek__Tax_Rate__c ) + buildertek__Shipping_Handling__c) + buildertek__Markup_Amount__c )*/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Original Contract plus Discounts and Markups.
CustomField.label: Total Contract Amount
